sentences.sContent: The most interesting dimension of this is what Google Search Appliance says about the increasing permeability of a company and the outside world.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most interesting dimension of this is what Google Search Appliance says about the increasing permeability of a company and the outside world.
sentences.sCn: 其中，最有趣的一点是谷歌搜索设备所反映的“公司和外部世界日益增加的渗透性”。

sentences.sContent: The idea behind enhanced, or engineered, geothermal systems is to inject water underground to enhance the permeability of rock, allowing for the release and capture of more heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The idea behind enhanced, or engineered, geothermal systems is to inject water underground to enhance the permeability of rock, allowing for the release and capture of more heat.
sentences.sCn: 增强型的或是工程型的地热系统将水注入到地下，使岩石的渗透性提高，这样便可以吸收或释放更多热量。

synos.tran: [植][细胞][地质][纺][生理][电子][油气]渗透性；[物]透磁率，导磁系数；弥漫

phrases.pCn: 相对渗透率；相对磁导率；空间磁导率
渗透系数；渗滤系数；透气系数；磁导系数
渗透试验；透水试验；透气性试验

words.tran: 渗透；[化学] 渗透作用；散布性
坡莫合金；透磁合金；镍铁导磁合金

trans.tranOther: the state or quality of being permeable
